The stranger glares at Aerotaur again, his insectoid legs start glowing at 
the tips as he prepares to fire at the enemy, his optical sensors glaring in 
anger. "You will be offlined for that" Recon informs him as he charges his 
energon blasts.

>::Aerotaur::
>     He quickly bats away the blade with his staff.  "Hey Windlord.  You 
>think
>you can handle the assassin again?"  He turns back to the newcomer.  "And
>you!  Who are you calling a Predacon?  This is the Chivtron Base."
